meta.content: Front Page; New York and Region
meta.name: online_sections

block.p: Warning on Global Warming A science panel called for prompt action by the Government on the threat of global warming. Page B12. Sports Boycott Sought The Health Secretary asked fans to boycott sports events sponsored by tobacco companies. Health, page B13. CUNY Protests Spread Students protesting budget cuts occupied parts of six campuses of the City University of New York. Page B1. The Automat Is Closed A chrome-and-glass Automat in midtown Manhattan, the last in the nation, has gulped its last coin. Page B1.
